akn:section.akn:heading: North Atlantic Treaty Organization Allied Special Operations Forces Command

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Of the amounts authorized to be appropriated for each fiscal year for operation and maintenance for the Army, the Secretary of Defense is authorized to use up to $55,000,000, to be derived from amounts made available for support of North Atlantic Treaty Organization (referred to in this section as “NATO”) operations, for each such fiscal year for the purposes set forth in subsection (b).
(b) The Secretary shall provide funds for the NATO Allied Special Operations Forces Command—
